fields.environment:
This exception was intermittent and do not appear always, I was not able to boil down the actual reason on why this is appearing.
hive: 0.8.1 
OS: CentOS 5.8
hadoop: 1.0
hive metastore: mysql 5.17

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: Exception while running a MR from hive
